xmlns:basic="http://petals.ow2.org/integration/tests/se-flowable/basic/services/v1" xmlns:bpmn="http://petals.ow2.org/se/flowable/annotations/1.0" xmlns:http="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/" xmlns:ns17="ns18" xmlns:ns18="wsdl" xmlns:ns19="basic" xmlns:ns21="ns26_" xmlns:ns22="xml" xmlns:ns23="mime" xmlns:ns23_="ns26" xmlns:ns24="ns8" xmlns:ns25="soap" xmlns:ns26="ns13" xmlns:ns26_="ns12" xmlns:ns27="basic" xmlns:ns28="ns10" xmlns:ns29="ns22" xmlns:ns29_="ns31" xmlns:ns31="ns15" xmlns:ns32="ns21" xmlns:ns32_="ns35" xmlns:ns33="ns10" xmlns:ns34="soap12" xmlns:ns35="ns19" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:soap12="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <w:types> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://petals.ow2.org/integration/tests/se-flowable/basic/services/v1"> <xs:element name="startBasicProcess"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="startBasicProcessResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="process-id"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema> </w:types> <w:message name="startBasicProcess"> <w:part element="basic:startBasicProcess" name="parameters"/> </w:message> <w:message name="startBasicProcessResponse"> <w:part element="basic:startBasicProcessResponse" name="parameters"/> </w:message> <w:portType name="basic"> <w:operation name="startBasicProcess"> <w:input message="basic:startBasicProcess"/> <w:output message="basic:startBasicProcessResponse"/> </w:operation> </w:portType> <w:binding name="basicSoapBinding" type="basic:basic"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <w:operation name="startBasicProcess"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://petals.ow2.org/integration/tests/se-flowable/basic/services/v1/startBasicProcess" style="document"/> <bpmn:operation action="startEvent" none-start-event-id="startEventBasicProcess" processDefinitionId="basicProcess" xmlns:ns10="xml" xmlns:ns12="wsdl" xmlns:ns14_="http" xmlns:ns15="w" xmlns:ns17="ns12" xmlns:ns21="ns10" xmlns:ns34="ns14_" xmlns:ns36="soap" xmlns:ns8="basic"/> <bpmn:output xmlns:ns10="xml" xmlns:ns12="wsdl" xmlns:ns14_="http" xmlns:ns15="w" xmlns:ns17="ns12" xmlns:ns21="ns10" xmlns:ns34="ns14_" xmlns:ns36="soap" xmlns:ns8="basic">startBasicProcessResponse.xsl</bpmn:output> <w:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </w:input> <w:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </w:output> </w:operation> </w:binding> <w:service name="basicService"> <w:port binding="basic:basicSoapBinding" name="edpt-a3478220-233a-11eb-81db-0242a23e860d"> <soap:address location="http://172.17.0.1:8084/petals/services/basicService-v1"/> </w:port> </w:service> </w:definitions>

<w:definitions name="FlowableGenericWsdl" targetNamespace="http://petals.ow2.org/components/flowable/generic/1.0" xmlns:w="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:flowable="http://petals.ow2.org/components/flowable/generic/1.0" xmlns:http="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/" xmlns:mime="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/mime/" xmlns:ns10="xsd" xmlns:ns11="xs" xmlns:ns12="http" xmlns:ns13="flowable" xmlns:ns15="w" xmlns:ns16="ns12" xmlns:ns17="wsdl" xmlns:ns18="ns10" xmlns:ns19="ns8" xmlns:ns19_="ns19" xmlns:ns20="ns17" xmlns:ns21="mime" xmlns:ns21_="ns24" xmlns:ns22="ns23" xmlns:ns23="ns13" xmlns:ns23_="ns31" xmlns:ns24="ns9" xmlns:ns25="ns16" xmlns:ns25_="ns28" xmlns:ns27="ns20" xmlns:ns28="xml" xmlns:ns29="ns25" xmlns:ns30="ns18" xmlns:ns30_="ns29" xmlns:ns31="ns11" xmlns:ns31_="ns15" xmlns:ns32="soap" xmlns:ns33="ns19_" xmlns:ns34="ns30" xmlns:ns40="ns27" xmlns:ns41="ns22" xmlns:ns42="ns33" xmlns:ns43="ns32" xmlns:ns8="soap12" xmlns:ns9="ns21" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:soap12="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <w:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://petals.ow2.org/components/flowable/generic/1.0"> <xs:element name="getUser"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="id" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getUserResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="user" type="flowable:User"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="User"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="id" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="first-name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="last-name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="email" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="unknownUser"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="id" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="searchUsers"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="group-id" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="searchUsersResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="user-id" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="searchGroups"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="user-id" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="searchGroupsResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="group-id" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getTasks"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element default="true" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="active" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The task state (true=active, false=inactive/completed). Default value: true.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="assignee" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The user as candidate or assignee</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="process-instance-identifier" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identifier of the process instance of tasks to retrieve</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="process-definition-identifier" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identifier of the process definition of tasks to retrieve</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="task-definition-identifier" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Definition identifier of the tasks to retrieve</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="with-process-instance-variables" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>If true, process instance variables will be retrieved and put in reply. Default: false</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getTasksResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="tasks" type="flowable:Tasks"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="Tasks"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="task" type="flowable:Task"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Task"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="process-variables" type="flowable:Variables"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Variable values that are set on process instance level</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="process-definition-identifier" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="process-instance-identifier" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="task-identifier" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="task-name" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="task-description" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="task-due-date" type="xs:dateTime" use="optional"/> <xs:attribute name="task-priority" type="xs:int" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="getProcessInstances"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="state" type="flowable:ProcessInstanceState"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The state of process instances to select. If not set, all states are taken into consideration.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="process-definition-identifier" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identifier of the process definition of the process instances to retrieve</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="process-instance-identifier" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identifier of the process instance to retrieve</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="variables" type="flowable:Variables"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Variable values that must be set on process instances to retrieve</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:simpleType name="ProcessInstanceState"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="active"/> <xs:enumeration value="suspended"/> <xs:enumeration value="finished"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:element name="getProcessInstancesResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="process-instances" type="flowable:ProcessInstances"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="suspendProcessInstances"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="process-instance-identifier" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identifier of a process instance to suspend</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="suspendProcessInstancesResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="process-instance-identifier"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identifier of the process instance suspended</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="xs:string"> <xs:attribute name="result" type="flowable:AdjournmentResult"/> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:simpleType name="AdjournmentResult"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="suspended"/> <xs:enumeration value="not-found"/> <xs:enumeration value="already-suspended"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:element name="activateProcessInstances"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="process-instance-identifier" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identifier of a process instance to activate</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="activateProcessInstancesResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="process-instance-identifier"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identifier of the process instance activated</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="xs:string"> <xs:attribute name="result" type="flowable:ActivationResult"/> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:simpleType name="ActivationResult"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="activated"/> <xs:enumeration value="not-found"/> <xs:enumeration value="already-activated"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="ProcessInstances"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="process-instance" type="flowable:ProcessInstance"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ProcessInstance"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="variables" type="flowable:Variables"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="process-definition-identifier" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="process-instance-identifier" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="state" type="flowable:ProcessInstanceState" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Variables"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="variable" type="flowable:Variable"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Variable"> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="xs:string"> <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Represents a variable with its name and value. If the variable type is 'java.util.Date', the value is given as 'xsd:date', otherwise the value is given as 'String'.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="as" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>If the variable type is different from 'string' it is needed to give it here for query..</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="string"/> <xs:enumeration value="long"/> <xs:enumeration value="double"/> <xs:enumeration value="date"/> <xs:enumeration value="boolean"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="getExecutions"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="process-definition-identifier" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identifier of the process definition of the process instances to retrieve</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="process-instance-identifier" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identifier of the process instance to retrieve</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="event-name" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Name of the event for which process instances to retrieve are waiting.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getExecutionsResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="executions" type="flowable:Executions"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="Executions"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="execution" type="flowable:Execution"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Execution"> <xs:attribute name="process-instance-identifier" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="invalidRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="message" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="stacktrace" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema> </w:types> <w:message name="invalidRequest"> <w:part element="flowable:invalidRequest" name="fault"/> </w:message> <w:message name="getUserRequest"> <w:part element="flowable:getUser" name="getUserRequest"/> </w:message> <w:message name="getUserResponse"> <w:part element="flowable:getUserResponse" name="getUserResponse"/> </w:message> <w:message name="searchUsersRequest"> <w:part element="flowable:searchUsers" name="searchUsersRequest"/> </w:message> <w:message name="searchUsersResponse"> <w:part element="flowable:searchUsersResponse" name="searchUsersResponse"/> </w:message> <w:message name="unknownUser"> <w:part element="flowable:unknownUser" name="fault"/> </w:message> <w:message name="searchGroupsRequest"> <w:part element="flowable:searchGroups" name="searchGroupsRequest"/> </w:message> <w:message name="searchGroupsResponse"> <w:part element="flowable:searchGroupsResponse" name="searchGroupsResponse"/> </w:message> <w:message name="getTasksRequest"> <w:part element="flowable:getTasks" name="getTasksRequest"/> </w:message> <w:message name="getTasksResponse"> <w:part element="flowable:getTasksResponse" name="getTasksResponse"/> </w:message> <w:message name="getProcessInstancesRequest"> <w:part element="flowable:getProcessInstances" name="getProcessInstancesRequest"/> </w:message> <w:message name="getProcessInstancesResponse"> <w:part element="flowable:getProcessInstancesResponse" name="getProcessInstancesResponse"/> </w:message> <w:message name="getProcessInstancesResponse"> <w:part element="flowable:getProcessInstancesResponse" name="getProcessInstancesResponse"/> </w:message> <w:message name="suspendProcessInstancesRequest"> <w:part element="flowable:suspendProcessInstances" name="suspendProcessInstancesRequest"/> </w:message> <w:message name="suspendProcessInstancesResponse"> <w:part element="flowable:suspendProcessInstancesResponse" name="suspendProcessInstancesResponse"/> </w:message> <w:message name="activateProcessInstancesRequest"> <w:part element="flowable:activateProcessInstances" name="activateProcessInstancesRequest"/> </w:message> <w:message name="activateProcessInstancesResponse"> <w:part element="flowable:activateProcessInstancesResponse" name="activateProcessInstancesResponse"/> </w:message> <w:message name="getExecutionsRequest"> <w:part element="flowable:getExecutions" name="getExecutionsRequest"/> </w:message> <w:message name="getExecutionsResponse"> <w:part element="flowable:getExecutionsResponse" name="getExecutionsResponse"/> </w:message> <w:portType name="User"> <w:operation name="get"> <w:input message="flowable:getUserRequest"/> <w:output message="flowable:getUserResponse"/> <w:fault message="flowable:unknownUser" name="unknownUser"/> <w:fault message="flowable:invalidRequest" name="invalidRequest"/> </w:operation> <w:operation name="search"> <w:input message="flowable:searchUsersRequest"/> <w:output message="flowable:searchUsersResponse"/> <w:fault message="flowable:invalidRequest" name="invalidRequest"/> </w:operation> </w:portType> <w:portType name="Group"> <w:operation name="search"> <w:input message="flowable:searchGroupsRequest"/> <w:output message="flowable:searchGroupsResponse"/> <w:fault message="flowable:invalidRequest" name="invalidRequest"/> </w:operation> </w:portType> <w:portType name="Task"> <w:operation name="getTasks"> <w:input message="flowable:getTasksRequest"/> <w:output message="flowable:getTasksResponse"/> <w:fault message="flowable:invalidRequest" name="invalidRequest"/> </w:operation> </w:portType> <w:portType name="ProcessInstances"> <w:operation name="getProcessInstances"> <w:input message="flowable:getProcessInstancesRequest"/> <w:output message="flowable:getProcessInstancesResponse"/> <w:fault message="flowable:invalidRequest" name="invalidRequest"/> </w:operation> <w:operation name="suspendProcessInstances"> <w:input message="flowable:suspendProcessInstancesRequest"/> <w:output message="flowable:suspendProcessInstancesResponse"/> <w:fault message="flowable:invalidRequest" name="invalidRequest"/> </w:operation> <w:operation name="activateProcessInstances"> <w:input message="flowable:activateProcessInstancesRequest"/> <w:output message="flowable:activateProcessInstancesResponse"/> <w:fault message="flowable:invalidRequest" name="invalidRequest"/> </w:operation> </w:portType> <w:portType name="Executions"> <w:operation name="getExecutions"> <w:input message="flowable:getExecutionsRequest"/> <w:output message="flowable:getExecutionsResponse"/> <w:fault message="flowable:invalidRequest" name="invalidRequest"/> </w:operation> </w:portType> soapAction="http://petals.ow2.org/components/flowable/generic/1.0/user/get"/> <w:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </w:input> <w:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </w:output> <w:fault name="unknownUser"> <soap:fault name="unknownUser" use="literal"/> </w:fault> <w:fault name="invalidRequest"> <soap:fault name="invalidRequest" use="literal"/> </w:fault> </w:operation> <w:operation name="invalidRequest"> <soap:fault name="invalidRequest" use="literal"/> </w:fault> </w:operation> </w:binding> <w:binding name="TaskServiceSoapBinding" type="flowable:Task"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <w:operation name="getTasks"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://petals.ow2.org/components/flowable/generic/1.0/getTasks"/> <w:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </w:input> <w:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </w:output> <w:fault name="invalidRequest"> <soap:fault name="invalidRequest" use="literal"/> </w:fault> </w:operation> </w:binding> <w:binding name="ProcessInstancesServiceSoapBinding" type="flowable:ProcessInstances"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> con:testCase.name: Launch process instance v1.0 via service v1.0

con:transfers.con:name: Push procInstId to retrieve userTask
con:transfers.con:targetStep: Check that the user task is assigned

con:testStep.name: Loop on check until task is assigned to kermit
